name: Boys "Rock" Necklace
description:
Get ready to ROCK with this funky boys necklace!

Handcrafted pendant measures 25mm in diameter and is created using a deep (3mm) silver plated bezel cup. Artwork is covered by a durable high gloss epoxy resin dome which both protects and enhances the image, and gives it a glass like appearance

***Your choice of either a red OR black nylon cord chain with sterling silver clasp & findings***** 
Chain lengths are adjustable - 42cm to 48cm

Available in 4 colours: Navy, Grey, Red & Green
 
Exclusive designs individually handcrafted by 'Poc Poch Children's Jewellery'

Made in Australia

Each necklace comes beautifully packaged in it's own fun, bright branded packaging, ready for gift giving

This bracelet is Rhodium Plated and features our instantly recognisable mini miss & me "M" charm.

description:
These pretty hoop earrings are the perfect size for little ears.

These earrings are very comfortable to wear and feature a white & yellow daisy

Daisy measures 5mm

name: Pink Daisy Stud Earrings
description:
Your little girl will love these Italian crafted sterling silver stud earrings, featuring a pink & white daisy.

These earrings have a uniquely designed safety screw back.

A screw-back earring features a clasp mechanism that allows you to adjust the fit of the earring by rotating the earring's backing. This system not only ensures comfort & safety, but also makes it difficult for the earring to loosen unintentionally.
See our screwback diagram for further details.

DIMENSIONS:
Daisy measures 5mm

Item: MSC951A

Each piece comes delivered to you in our signature "mini miss & me" gift box

"Click" on Images for larger view

name: Pink Daisy Love Jewellery Set
description:
SAVE 10% INSTANTLY

Our popular Pink Daisy Love Necklace & Stud Earrings now come as a set for the ultimate gift

This set includes two items: 
one pair of pink daisy earrings and one pink daisy necklace

Earrings:
* Rhodium plated sterling silver
* Daisy charm measures 7mm x 7mm

Necklace:
* Rhodium plated sterling silver
* Daisy charm measures 7mm x 7mm
* Includes an adjustable 16"- 18" sterling silver belcher chain featuring our instantly recognisable "M" charm

Item: MS951SS-SET

description:

The ear post has a groove at the end that acts as a stopper for the butterfly back, making them secure, safe and easy to wear.

These earrings are Rhodium Plated and come delivered to you in a beautiful mini miss & me gift box

name: Pink Butterfly Id Bracelet
description:
Item: MID170SS

This classic child's Id bracelet measures 17cm in length, and can be adjusted to 15cm using the larger link, making it suitable for most wrist sizes.

The solid sterling silver Id plate measures 2.5cm long, 0.5cm wide and can be engraved with a child's name, initials, or a date to mark a special occasion.
The butterfly charm measures 9mm in length and width.

This bracelet is Rhodium Plated and features our NEW mini miss & me "M" charm.

WE CAN ENGRAVE FOR YOU....

Regular engraving is done by hand using a machine burr, often giving your piece a "not so perfect" look.

mini miss & me's master engraver will machine engrave your piece, creating perfect letters & numbers, using the latest advanced laser engraving techniques.

Unless instructed otherwise, initials will be engraved in capitals and words or names will be engraved with the first letter in capitals.

Your bracelet can be engraved on the front and back of the Id plate, up to 9 characters.

FONTS available: « Vanessa « Victoria « Baby Script « Roman « Script

DELIVERY:
Engraving will add a day or two to your order - please let us know if you need it by a certain date and we will do our best!

options.name: With Machine Engraving Up To 9 Characters (add $25.00)

name: Gift Certificates - $5 to $100
description:
Give a practical gift with a mini miss & me Gift Certificate! 

mini miss & me Gift Certificates make the perfect gift for birthdays, baby showers, christenings, communions, and any special occasion that needs celebrating.  

Simply choose the amount, add it to your cart, proceed to checkout, and then email us with the recipients name & address, along with your personalised message. 

Your gift certificate will then be posted.

Alternatively, we can send the Gift Certificate to your address and you can deliver it personally to the recipient. The Choice is yours!

Gift Certificates allows the recipient to select any product in our store, at any time of the day, easily & safely online.

GIFT CERTIFICATE TERMS

• Gift Certificates are only redeemable through our website www.minimiss.com.au

• Purchasers are responsible for providing an accurate and deliverable address.

• Gift Certificates cannot be returned for a cash refund and are not redeemable for cash.

• Any unused balance can be used towards a future order.

• If your order exceeds the amount of the Gift Certificate, the recipient is responsible for paying the balance.

• Gift Certificates are non-transferable.

• The postage cost for Gift Certificates is FREE

For any special requests related to Gift Certificates please contact us directly via our "contact us" page, and we will be happy to assist.

name: Blue & White Butterfly Hoop Earrings
description:
Item: MH171

Your little princess will adore these Italian crafted sterling silver hoop earrings, featuring a blue & white butterfly

These pretty hoop earrings are the perfect size for little ears.
The clip on clasp fits easily and comfortably & is very secure.

Butterfly measures 6mm

Each piece comes delivered to you in our signature
"mini miss & me" gift box

name: Sterling Silver Hinged Bangle
description:
Item: BAN01

Made in Italy, this classically simple sterling silver bangle makes a perfect Christening, New Baby, or Birthday gift. Packaged in a stylish mini miss & me jewellery box, this bangle makes an ideal keepsake gift which will be treasured for a lifetime.

Made in an oval wrist shape, with a spring hinge and clasp, this bangle is very easy to get on & off.

Suitable for babies, toddlers, and children up to the age of 12yrs

DIMENSIONS:
Bangle is 40mm x 50mm 

Round, hollow tubing is 3mm wide

Perfect for gift giving, each piece comes delivered to you in our signature "mini miss & me" gift box. 

Why not combine this bangle with a charm bracelet for the ultimate girls jewellery gift!

name: Id Bracelet With Blue Daisy Charm
description:
Item: MIB952

Designed to be worn as your child’s first piece of precious jewellery, this Italian crafted Sterling Silver Id bracelet with belcher chain, features a cute hand enamelled blue daisy charm.

An Id bracelet is a traditional gift for a christening, naming day, or birthday, and the Id plate can be engraved with your child's name, initials or dates to mark a special occasion.

This Bracelet is also designed with one larger link, so it can be fastened at a shorter length for smaller wrists.

A special gift that your baby will treasure forever!

DIMENSIONS:
Bracelet Length 14.5cm
Id Plate: 20mm x 5mm
Daisy Charm measures 6mm

Let us personalize your order with machine engraving!

Our master engraver will machine engrave your piece, creating perfect letters & numbers, using the latest advanced laser engraving techniques.

Regular engraving is done by hand using a machine burr, often giving your piece a "not so perfect" look.

Unless instructed otherwise, initials will be engraved in capitals and words or names will be engraved with the first letter in capitals.

Your bracelet can be engraved on the front or back of the Id plate, up to 9 characters.

FONTS available: « Vanessa « Victoria « Baby Script « Roman « Script

DELIVERY:
Engraving will add a day or two to your order - please let us know if you need it by a certain date and we will do our best!

Each piece comes delivered to you in our signature "mini miss & me" gift box

options.name: With Machine Engraving Up To 9 Characters (add $25.00)

name: Ladybeetle Drop Stud Earrings
description:
Item: MDS120

Your little girl will love these Italian crafted sterling silver drop stud earrings, featuring a cute ladybeetle.

These earrings have a uniquely designed safety screw back.

A screw-back earring features a clasp mechanism that allows you to adjust the fit of the earring by rotating the earring's backing. This system not only ensures comfort & safety, but also makes it difficult for the earring to loosen unintentionally.
See our screwback diagram for further details.

DIMENSIONS:
Ladybeetle measures 6mm
Drop 5mm

Each piece comes delivered to you in our signature "mini miss & me" gift box
